example.eg: That guy is so good looking!
He was so mad that he forgot to eat dinner.
example.egtrans: 他是如此生气，气得都忘了吃饭。

example.eg: I'm hungry, so I'm going to get something to eat.
example.egtrans: 我饿了，所以要去找点东西来吃。

example.eg: I want to go to the movies and so does she.
example.egtrans: 我想去看电影，她也想去。

example.eg: Does he like her?  I think so.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 当真, 确实, 正是

example.eg: Dinner is over ladies and gentlemen, and so to the next item on our agenda.
example.egtrans: 女士们，先生们，晚餐已毕，让我们接着进行下一项活动吧。

example.eg: So, as I have already explained, there really is no need to worry.
example.egtrans: 所以，如我所说，真的没必要担心。

example.eg: Mario gets paid more than you. So?
example.egtrans: 马里奥的工资比你高。那又怎样？

example.eg: You are a gentleman; may you remain so all your years.
example.egtrans: 你真是一名绅士，愿你在之后的人生中也能如此。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同样, 一样, 如此，像这样

example.eg: The teacher spoke slowly so her students would understand her.
example.egtrans: 小心驾驶，好安全抵达。老师慢言细语，好让学生们理解她所讲的内容。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 这样一来, 如此一来, 好让

example.eg: That car is nicer than your car.  It is so!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 真地，真正地，确实如此地

example.eg: When ironing, you need to move the hot iron over the clothes so.
example.egtrans: 熨烫时，你需要像这样将滚烫的熨斗在衣物上移动。

dsense.name: so
dsense.guideword: (changing, returning to subject) (用于转换、回归话题)

example.eg: So, Alice, why did you come to Edinburgh?
"So" comes before "la" in the musical scale.
